abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Brazil", { "or" : [ "TaxonKey is Neomarica Sprague", "TaxonKey is Pseudotrimezia R.C.Foster", "TaxonKey is Trimezia Salisb. ex Herb.", "TaxonKey is Pseudiris Chukr & A.Gil" ] } ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from CSIC-Real Jardín Botánico-Colección de Plantas Vasculares (MA) 1 records from Herbarium Hamburgense 1 records from MAR - Herbário do Maranhão 1 records from Colección de plantas vasculares de Brasil del Herbario "Jaime Andrés Rodríguez". LEB-Brasil 1 records from SHPR - Herbário da Universidade Tecnológica Federal do Paraná (UTFPR), campus Santa Helena 1 records from TEPB - Herbário Graziela Barroso 1 records from HUESB - Herbário da Universidade Estadual do Sudoeste da Bahia 1 records from University of Vermont, Pringle Herbarium 1 records from Vascular Plant Herbarium, Oslo (O), Natural History Museum, University of Oslo 1 records from Sammlung Ernst Ule sinenumero Herbarium Hamburgense HBG 1 records from Geneva Herbarium – General Collection (G) 1 records from Funed-Pol -
